#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	long long a[10010] = {0};
	long long k,max;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		k = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(i == 0)
				max = a[i];
			else 
			{
				if(a[i] > max)
				{
					k = k + (a[i] - max);
					//a[i] = max;
				}
				else if(a[i] < max)
				{
					if((a[i]+k) >= max)
					{
						k = k + a[i] - max;
						//a[i] = max;
					}
					else
					{
						long long temp = (max*i + a[i] + k)/(i+1);
						k = (max*i + a[i] + k)%(i+1);
						max = temp;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max);
	}
	return 0;
}
